body_content.explanation: to change the way that an organization, company, or product is seen by the public:
examples: The firm had spent £6 million in an attempt to reimage itself.
The company revealed its plans to reimage all of its retail outlets.

body_content.explanation: to run a program that deals with any problems on a computer and makes sure that it is using the most suitable programs:
examples: The best solution to the problem is to reimage your hard disk.
They reimaged the computers to remove any viruses.
If you follow these instructions, there will be no need to reimage.

body_content.explanation: the process of running a program that deals with any problems on a computer and makes sure that it is using the most suitable programs:
examples: I think I'm the only person in the office who hasn't needed a reimage on their computer.
Cleaning malware will usually take longer than a re-image.
